rows.label: tlk70000063_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Hmmm, I think pretty soon I'll have
done all the research I can do here...

rows.label: tlk70000063_03_msg0002
rows.name:
The technology being developed in
Iira is the best in Alst. Or so they
say.

rows.label: tlk70000063_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm sure there's all sorts of research
about Divine Beasts and ether there, too...
I'd like to go and further my research.

rows.label: tlk70000063_03_msg0004
rows.name:
However, as you can see, I'm the
brainy kind of adventurer and not
the brawny kind...

rows.label: tlk70000063_03_msg0005
rows.name:
I don't have the skill to fight off the
monsters between here and Iira, so
going there is still just a pipe dream.
